name: SentinelOne
0:
”Alexa, ask SentinelOne for summary report”
”Alexa, ask SentinelOne for daily report”
”Alexa, ask SentinelOne for server version”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sentinelone
des:
SentinelOne Endpoint Protection confronts the entire threat lifecycle to thwart the impact of attacks on endpoints. The SentinelOne platform delivers the defenses you need to prevent, detect, and undo—known and unknown—threats.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your SentinelOne server account. Only the administrators of SentinelOne with accounts on the server can connect and link this skill.

After connecting Alexa to your SentinelOne server, the following commands are available:
"Alexa, ask SentinelOne for the summary report"
"Alexa, ask SentinelOne for the daily report"
"Alexa, ask SentinelOne for the server name and version number"

For further information about SentinelOne, please visit For further information about SentinelOne, please visit https://www.sentinelone.com/.
